name: SUB10 (BangTheWall)
description:
Your task is to collect Tuskium, a rare mineral from a shell with a soul of its own. But beware, as the deep waters won't let you have it without a fight. You'll have torpedoes to defend yourself with, but it's best to avoid the sinister creatures entirely.

You are equipped with a sonar, which scans the surrounding area every 10 seconds.

Credits:

Ralf Brait Lehepuu (Me) - Programming, Game Design
Laur Mait Lehepuu - Programming, Sound Design
Laas Hendrik Lumberg - Sound Design, Game Design
Kaisa Uik - Art

This game was made in less than 48 hours and was voted for the 2nd place at the UT Game Jam 2022 and also won the special prize put out by the Creative Foundation Games team.
